answer1: We offer a wide range of sea equipment including kayaks, paddleboards, snorkeling gear, and canoes.
answer2: We provide tents, sleeping bags, hiking poles, crampons, and climbing gear for mountain activities.
answer3: You can book equipment online through our website or by calling us directly. Once your reservation is confirmed, you can pick up the equipment at our store or opt for delivery.
answer4: Our rates vary depending on the type of equipment and the rental duration. Please check our pricing page for more details.
answer5: Yes, we offer discounts for group bookings and long-term rentals. Contact us for a personalized quote.
